snippet: In recent years, climate change skeptics have seized on one last argument that cannot be so readily dismissed. Their theory is that clouds will save us.
abstract: Climate change skeptics believe that clouds will shift in such a way as to counter much of the expected temperature rise and preserve the equable climate on which civilization depends; theory exploits the greatest remaining mystery in climate science: how clouds will react to added greenhouse gases that cause global warming; politicians looking for reasons not to tackle climate change welcome this theory. (Series: Temperature Rising).
lead_paragraph: In recent years, climate change skeptics have seized on one last argument that cannot be so readily dismissed. Their theory is that clouds will save us.

headline.main: Clouds’ Effect on Climate Change Is Last Bastion for Dissenters
